archimate:Requirement.name: IM.1.5.5: DLP tools should be managed via a central management console (a single interface designed to author, implement and manage DLP policies), which can be used to record different DLP solutions across an organisation (e.g. cloud-based, network-based and host-based) and consolidate logging, reporting, review of policy violations, incident remediation and system administration.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
